articles.description: BBC broadcaster Bill Turnbull, who died in August, is celebrated at his funeral in Suffolk.
articles.content:
Friends and colleagues of former BBC broadcaster Bill Turnbull have paid tribute to him at his funeral service.
Turnbull, who hosted BBC Breakfast for 15 years and was diagnosed with prostate cancer… [+4981 chars]

articles.title: London fashion week pays tribute to Queen as Monday’s parties banned - The Guardian

articles.content:
